allow: Bash(powershell "Get-Process | Sort-Object WorkingSet -Descending | Select-Object -First 15 ProcessName, @{Name=''Memory(MB)'';Expression={[math]::Round($_WorkingSet/1MB,2)}} | Format-Table -AutoSize")

Bash(powershell -Command "Get-Process | Sort-Object WorkingSet -Descending | Select-Object -First 20 | Format-Table ProcessName, @{Label=''Memory(MB)''; Expression={[math]::Round($_WorkingSet/1MB,2)}} -AutoSize")

Bash(cmd /c "powershell -Command ""Get-Service | Where-Object {$_Name -like ''*xtu*'' -or $_DisplayName -like ''*xtu*'' -or $_Name -like ''*intel*''} | Format-Table Name, DisplayName, Status -AutoSize""")
